name: Wolfie's Break Out
description:
Back in my day we had to go outside and to a place called "The Arcade" to play video games.
take a trip back to simplistic controls and try to beat your high-score or even challenge your friend to beat it with this retro arcade brick breaking game


Why all you need is a mouse to move the paddle back and forth whilst keeping the ball in play


A throw back to the old school brick breaker games! Keep your brain fit with this game
